main event: Two parts of a meteor were observed off the coast of Oregon on 12 November 1947.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 40 miles north of Cape Blanco., The object was described as a ball of light with a trail., There were two objects observed, likely parts of a meteor., The incident lasted approximately 15-20 seconds., The estimated speed of the objects was between 700 and 900 MPH.
